title: "Bad Boys"
description: Fellas laugh at a lib critic of the progrum, media obsession with a Southwest pilot, and Kamala's Virginia stumbles before playing a new game of Klain to Fame. Katie Boyd Britt joins the show from Alabama to discuss her race for U.S. Senate.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Josh Holmes, Michael Duncan, Comfortably Smug, Katie Boyd Britt)
